titles.title: Eliminate DEI in the Military Act
Eliminate DEI in the Military Act
To prohibit the use of Federal funds for any DEI activity in the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Eliminate DEI in the Military Act
This bill prohibits the use of federal funds for diversity, equity, and inclusion activities (e.g., training) of the Armed Forces, national service academies, or the Department of Defense.
